alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Cross; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:48PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Poinsett, northwestern Crittenden and northeastern Cross Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 548 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Marked Tree, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Earle, Tyronza, Three Forks, Togo, Stewart, Colton, Twist, Boat Run, Cloar, Galilee, Coldwater, Northern Ohio and Monterey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
